mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_dir ( user_id, dir_name, full_path, parent_id, create_time, modify_time ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{dirName}, #{fullPath}, #{parentId}, #{createTime}, #{modifyTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT d.id id, d.user_id userId, d.parent_id parentId, d.dir_name dirName, d.full_path fullPath, d.create_time createTime, d.modify_time modifyTime FROM user_dir d WHERE d.user_id=#{userId} AND d.full_path=#{fullPath}
